snippet: The judge’s decision could come after a verdict is delivered in the trial of Sandy Annabi, a former Yonkers councilwoman.
abstract: Judge Colleen McMahon of Federal District Court in Manhattan denies request to dismiss corruption case against former Yonkers councilwoman Sandy Annabi and her co-defendant Zehy Jereis, leaving open the possibility of a decision after the jury delivers a verdict; Annabi is accused of selling her vote for secret payments.
lead_paragraph: The judge’s decision could come after a verdict is delivered in the trial of Sandy Annabi, a former Yonkers councilwoman.

headline.seo: Judge in Yonkers Corruption Case Denies Dismissal Request
headline.main: Charges Not Dismissed in Yonkers Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: Yonkers Case Will Continue With Charges Intact, for Now
